Summary: This document is a timetable for the 3rd and 4th semesters of the Master of Technology in Enterprise Business Analytics program. The course is managed by Christine and classes are held on Saturdays from 9:00am to 5:00pm on various dates in January, February, March, and May 2025. The focus of the program is on customer analytics and campaign analytics, and it is part of the NUS Graduate Certificate in Customer Analytics. The timetable is updated as of 19/3/2025.

The document lists the timetable for the 3rd and 4th semesters of the EBA5006 Graduate Certificate in Big Data Analytics course. The course manager is Dave Ho and the classes will be held on Saturdays from 9:00am to 5:00pm on various dates between January and June 2025. The course also includes a capstone/internship component and is part of the MTech EBAC program.

The document contains the exam timetable for AY2024/2025 Semester 2 for students in the MTech EBAC program. The exams will take place from May 13-16 and will cover various topics such as customer analytics, big data analytics, intelligent sensing systems, and engineering big data. The dates are subject to change due to unforeseen circumstances. The exam times are from 6:30pm to 10:00pm and the specific exams for each course are listed. The document also includes a disclaimer and a note that the timetable was last updated on March 19, 2025.

This page outlines the course schedule for the 3rd and 4th semesters of the EBA5004 Graduate Certificate in Practical Language Processing and Master of Technology in Enterprise Business Analytics programs. The classes will be held on Saturdays from 9:00am to 5:00pm, starting on July 26, 2025 and ending on October 11, 2025. The courses will cover topics such as Aobo Text Processing Using Machine Learning and Conversational Uls, and will be managed by Zhenzhen. This information is confidential and was last updated on March 19, 2025.

The timetable for the 3rd and 4th semesters for the graduate certificate course in Specialized Predictive Modelling and Forecasting is provided. The course will be held on Saturdays from 9:00am to 5:00pm, starting on July 5th, 2025 and ending on October 4th, 2025. The course manager is Brandon, and the course topics include Product and Pricing Analytics, Complex Predictive Modelling & Forecasting, Commercial Excellence, and MTech EBAC. The timetable is confidential and was last updated on March 19th, 2025.

This document outlines the course schedule for the 3rd and 4th semesters of the Graduate Certificate in Intelligent Financial Risk Management course at NUS. The course will be held on Saturdays from 9:00am to 5:00pm, starting on July 5th, 2025 and ending on October 11th, 2025. The examination period for the first semester of the 2025/2026 academic year is tentatively scheduled for the second week of November 2025, with confirmed dates to be announced later. The course will cover topics such as Advanced Machine Learning for Financial Services, Explainable and Responsible AI for Finance, and Credit Risk Modelling and Analytics.
